text: Haga iloo ina gi nia daangada boloo, ‘Di ingoo hua tangada dela e madagu, e humalia e hana gi dono hale, gei gidaadou gaa noho i ginei i di Gonduu Gilead.’” Malaa, nia daane e madalua maa lua mana (22,000) ne hula gi muli, gei nia daane e madangaholu mana (10,000) ne noho.7.3 Deuteronomy 20.8
